title: Packers: Received $432.6M in revenue sharing
content: The Packers, the NFL's only publicly owned team, revealed Wednesday that the national revenue sharing from the previous fiscal year was a record $432.6 million.

title: Westwood slams rankings system as 'mockery'
content: Lee Westwood became the latest LIV Golf player to criticize the world golf ranking system, calling it a "mockery."

title: Clean slate: Rockies get 1st shutout in 221 games
content: Rookie right-hander Tanner Gordon led the way as the Rockies recorded their first shutout in 221 games, ending the third-longest streak without one in MLB history.

title: USC freshman Arenas injures knee, out 6-8 months
content: USC freshman Alijah Arenas, who was the No. 13 recruit in the ESPN 100, will need surgery after injuring his knee and will miss six to eight months, the school announced.

title: Ohtani ties Dodgers' mark with HR in 5th straight
content: Shohei Ohtani homered for the fifth consecutive game, becoming the seventh player in Dodgers franchise history to accomplish that feat.

title: Giants' Verlander finally gets 1st win in 17th start
content: Justin Verlander ended the longest streak of starts in a season without a win in Giants history, breaking a 16-game drought with a 9-3 victory vs. the Braves.

title: Bonmati: Spain had intel on Berger for winner
content: Spain's match-winner Aitana Bonmatí said she knew Germany goalkeeper Ann-Katrin Berger would leave space at her near post after scoring the goal which sets up a European Championship final against England on Sunday.

title: Aggies' collie mascot has surgery to remove eye
content: Reveille X, Texas A&M's beloved collie mascot, was resting comfortably after having her right eye surgically removed after being diagnosed with glaucoma.

title: Passan's ultimate MLB trade deadline preview: Where all 30 teams stand, best fits and latest intel
content: From the contenders to the rebuilders, here's what every front office is thinking ahead of the July 31 deadline.

title: Bonmatí's star power shines through as Spain see off Germany
content: Aitana Bonmatí struck an extra-time winner to send Spain into Sunday's Euro 2025 final against England at the expense of eight-time winners Germany.

title: 'Pay Us What You Owe Us': Inside the WNBPA's statement-making All-Star Weekend
content: As CBA negotiations continue, WNBA players made a unified statement at the All-Star Game. Here's how they landed on "Pay Us What You Owe Us" shirts.

title: How the Valkyries have exceeded all expectations -- even their own
content: Expansion franchises have historically struggled in Year 1. But Golden State is fighting for a WNBA playoff spot.

title: NBA rebuild rankings: How close 14 teams are to title contention
content: Is Dallas' rebuild already complete? How close is San Antonio? We examine the paths forward for 14 teams that missed the playoffs.

title: The worst decision every NBA team has made over the past five years, ranked 30 to 1
content: Zach Kram examines the deals, trades and picks that all 30 NBA teams would like to take back from the 2020s.

title: "If he failed, their process failed": Inside the NFLPA meltdown
content: Players are looking to learn from the mistakes that led them to hire ex-NFLPA executive director Lloyd Howell Jr.

title: We ranked the 50 most impactful NFL offseason moves, from Davante Adams to Russell Wilson
content: Which offseason acquisitions and draft picks will have the most impact at their new destinations in Year 1? Matt Bowen ranks the top 50.

title: Manchester United's U.S. preseason tour: Amorim's goals, players to watch
content: Manchester United and Ruben Amorim have arrived in the U.S. aiming to lay the groundwork for a rebound after a dismal 2024-25 campaign.

title: Rashford joins Barcelona: 'Feels like I'm at home'
content: Barcelona have completed the signing of Manchester United and England forward Marcus Rashford on a season-long loan, the Catalan club confirmed

title: Chicharito fined amid backlash over sexist remarks
content: Chivas striker Javier "Chicharito" Hernandez has been fined following an investigation by Mexico's federation into sexist remarks he made online.

title: Saka nets as Arsenal beat Milan in tour opener
content: Arsenal made a winning start to their preseason tour of Asia after Bukayo Saka's 53rd-minute strike earned a 1-0 victory over AC Milan in Singapore.

title: Sources: Man Utd may not sign No. 9 this summer
content: Manchester United could go into the season without a new striker following a frustrating search for a recognised No. 9, sources have told ESPN.

title: Barça cancel Japan friendly citing contract breach
content: Barcelona have suspended the Japan part of this month's Asia tour due to what the club said was a serious breach of contract by the promoter.

title: France's Euro players victims of 'hateful' abuse
content: French football's governing body has called for an investigation into hateful comments made online following the national team's exit from the Women's Euros after a penalty shootout loss to Germany in the quarter-finals.

title: Messi, Alba won't play in MLS All-Star Game
content: Inter Miami stars Lionel Messi and Jordi Alba will not play in Wednesday's MLS All-Star Game, MLS confirmed.

title: What to expect from Ohtani as a pitcher for the rest of 2025
content: Shohei Ohtani has ramped up his workload since making his pitching debut as a Dodger back on June 16, but what can we expect out of him for the rest of the season?

content: Which players can you count on to break out in 2025? Our experts go around the league and identify six that stand out.

title: Scheffler's dominance, players to watch and how the Ryder Cup teams look
content: What's next for Scottie Scheffler? Who are the locks for Bethpage, and who has work to do? Following The Open, we look ahead to the rest of the 2025 golf season.

title: Best of the rest: Who's left in NHL free agency?
content: Most of the NHL free agent deals are handed out July 1. But there are still some players left -- here are the top remaining unrestricted free agents.

title: Jets go high-tech (and old-school) with locker room redesign
content: A barbershop, along with customized video screens and lockers give the Jets' new locker room a modern-meets-retro feel.

title: Betting buzz: Dallas Cowboys' season win total lowest since 2003
content: The Cowboys' win total for this season has dropped to 7.5 at ESPN BET, the lowest preseason win total for a Cowboys team since 2003.

title: Petitti letter: Michigan sign-stealing penalties have gone far enough
content: Despite charges of serious NCAA rule violations, commissioner indicates sanctions have run their course

title: Grading 50-plus NBA deals, including the CP3-Clippers reunion
content: Kevin Pelton breaks down the most impactful signings, including the Clippers bringing back Chris Paul.

title: Trump Was Told He Is In Epstein Files: Report
content: U.S. Attorney General Pam Bondi told President Donald Trump in May that his name appeared in investigative files related to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.

title: Railways Sanctions Rs 1.9 Lakh Crore Projects In 4 Years: Ashwini Vaishnaw
content: A total of 237 projects of a total length of 9,703 kms -- costing about Rs 1,90,333 crore -- have been sanctioned across Indian Railways during the last three fiscals and the current financial year to date, the Parliament was informed on Wednesday.

title: India's Mobile Phone Exports Rise 127 Times To Rs 2 lakh Crore In 10 Years
content: Export of mobile phones from India increased by 127 times to reach Rs 2 lakh crore in the last 10 financial years, Parliament was informed on Wednesday.

title: Russia, Ukraine Agree To Swap Prisoners Of War Amid Peace Talks In Turkey
content: Ukraine on Wednesday proposed direct talks within weeks between its President Volodymyr Zelensky and Russia's Vladimir Putin, but Moscow tempered prospects for progress at a fresh round of talks in Istanbul on Wednesday.

title: Mumbai-Bound Air India Express Flight Aborts Takeoff Due To Technical Issue
content: A Mumbai-bound Air India Express plane, with around 160 passengers onboard, aborted takeoff due to a technical snag at the Delhi airport on Wednesday evening, according to a source.

title: PM Modi In London: UK, India To Sign Landmark Free Trade Pact
content: Britain and India will sign a landmark free trade agreement on Thursday during a visit by Prime Minister Narendra Modi, sealing a deal to cut tariffs on goods from textiles to whisky and cars and allow more market access for businesses.

title: India Makes Big Jump In Henley Passport Index, Visa-Free Entry To 59 Countries Now
content: According to the Henley Passport Index 2025, the Indian passport has made a long jump and climbed eight places - from 85th to 77th - after dropping five spots last year, despite only gaining two destinations to its visa-free tally.

title: Tulsi Gabbard Releases New Documents Targeting Obama Over 2016 Polls
content: Tulsi Gabbard, the director of national intelligence, on Wednesday released a slew of documents that she said implicate members of the Obama administration for weaponising US intelligence.

title: India To Send Burn-Specialist Team To Dhaka To Treat Air Crash Victims
content: The deployment of the medical team comes as part of India's response to the recent fighter jet crash in the Diabari area of Bangladesh's Dhaka, for which India has offered medical assistance to support the treatment of victims.

title: Strong India-UK Friendship Is Essential For Global Progress: PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived in London on Wednesday evening for his two-day visit to the United Kingdom (UK), and said that a "strong friendship between the two countries is essential for global progress".

title: Narendra Modi UK Visit LIVE: PM Modi Lands In London, Trade Agreement, Khalistanis On Agenda
content: PM Narendra Modi UK and Maldives Visit LIVE Updates: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to start his four-day visit to the United Kingdom and the Maldives on Wednesday.

title: PM Modi Lands In UK, Long-Awaited Free Trade Deal Expected Today: 10 Points
content: The free trade agreement is India's first major bilateral trade agreement with a developed economy in over a decade.

title: US Judge Denies Request To Unseal Epstein Grand Jury Records In Florida
content: A judge on Wednesday rejected a Trump administration request to unseal transcripts from grand jury investigations of Jeffrey Epstein years ago in Florida, though a similar records request is pending in New York.

title: Hospitalised MK Stalin Resumes Office Duty, Reviews Welfare Camps Via Video
content: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Mk  Stalin, admitted to a private hospital on Monday in Chennai, has resumed office work from the hospital.

title: Even Tech Giants Can Be Non-State Actors: RSS's Ram Madhav On New World Order
content: The world in 21st Century will be multipolar instead of bipolar and would come with a new set of global institutions, non-state actors and challengers, said RSS's Ram Madhav in his new book - "The New World: 21st Century Global Order and India".

title: Kidneys Removed During Uterus Surgery; Probe Agency ED Case Against Fake Doctor
content: The Enforcement Directorate (ED) has filed a prosecution complaint under the provisions of the PMLA before a special court in Patna against a quack and his assistant in a case of alleged "organ removal and financial fraud".

title: Hong Kong Court Strikes Down Law On Use Of Opposite-Sex Toilets
content: A Hong Kong court struck down laws on Wednesday criminalising people for going into public toilets designated for the opposite sex, a ruling hailed as "a forward step" for transgender rights.

title: "My Family Created Israel": The Rothschilds And Birth Of A Nation
content: For over a century, the Rothschilds, a Jewish banking dynasty that began in 18th-century Frankfurt, quietly helped lay the economic, political, and physical foundations of the state of Israel.

title: Doctor Who Supplied Matthew Perry Ketamine Pleads Guilty
content: A doctor who supplied Matthew Perry with ketamine pleaded guilty on Wednesday in connection with the 2023 drug overdose death of the "Friends" star, US media reported.

title: Why Ghislaine Maxwell May Finally Reveal Jeffrey Epstein's Secrets: Report
content: Ghislaine Maxwell's meeting with a federal prosecutor has sparked speculation about a possible deal that could expose long-guarded details of the Jeffrey Epstein case.

content: Snehagramam is being developed on 25 acres provided by the Planatation Corporation as compensation in Muliyar grama panchayat

title: Kauvery Hospital opens specialised HCM clinic at its facility in Vadapalani
content: The clinic aims to streamline access, improve clinical outcomes and offer focused, affordable care for a complex condition that often requires cross-specialty coordination.

content: The deal would boost trade between the two countries by £25.5 billion each year, a U.K. government statement said

title: Residents of localities along ECR complain that civic works have turned many roads slushy
content: The common complaint is that the roads were cut for only about 5 ft width, but, the dug up earth was piled and left alongside.

content: Bench invokes inherent powers to annul earlier judgment after finding fraud and suppression of facts by litigant

title: ₹29,353 crore spent to upgrade railway infrastructure in Bihar so far, says Vaishnaw
content: The Minister said that Bihar’s railway budget has seen a nine-fold rise in 11 years, and key river bridges such as Munger, Patna and Kosi have been completed

title: ED arrests three in ₹1,000 crore real estate fraud case

title: Navy chief hails 100th indigenous ship as symbol of maritime self-reliance
content: Admiral Tripathi spoke of the Indian Navy’s Vision 2047 to transform into an ‘Aatmanirbhar’ force through leadership-driven focus on innovation, indigenisation, and integration of niche, disruptive, and emerging technologies

title: Defence Secretary holds bilateral meeting with Director General of Israeli Ministry of Defence
content: The two sides agreed to work towards developing an institutional framework for further deepening of defence ties

title: DD Free Dish expands reach with greater representation of languages from southern States

title: Plea in Supreme Court seeks removal of MP Minister for ‘nauseating’ remarks against Colonel Sofiya Qureshi
content: In the May 19 hearing, Justice Kant had remarked that the Minister’s comments amounted to “crass, thoughtless remarks”. The court said there was no point apologising to the court merely to “wriggle out of a situation”

title: Fewer foreign trips, protocol lapses upset Jagdeep Dhankhar; former Vice-President felt he had a diminished role

title: Kerala bids tearful farewell to V.S. Achuthanandan

title: Telangana argues for restriction of diversion for KC Canal system by A.P.

title: Home Ministry begins moving out of British-era North Block
content: It is shifting to Common Central Secretariat building on Janpath; Once all offices move out of North and South Blocks, these will be turned into a museum

title: First exports from BBP: Four Asian elephants head to Japan
content: The exchange is a part of a larger multi exchange programme, where in return, the park will receive four cheetahs, four jaguars, four pumas, three chimpanzees and eight black-capped capuchins

title: Hole in one: Pinhole pupilloplasty emerges as alternative to corneal transplants
content: While a corneal transplant tries to address damage to the cornea, PPP tries to restore vision by tackling the pupil. In PPP, the size of the pupil is reduced surgically, to 1.5 mm, thus blocking peripheral vision and allowing focused central rays inside the eye, ensuring that the image is clear and without distortion

title: Congress attacks PM for ‘silence’ over Trump’s claims
content: In a sharp attack on the PM’s silence, Mr. Kharge asks, “Does Narendra Modi want to be subservient to Trump?”; Rahul Gandhi says “something is fishy” as PM has not responded to Mr. Trump’s claim of halting Operation Sindoor

title: Gait test conducted on accused in Kolkata law student gang-rape case

title: GST: Small traders call off protest plan

title: V.S. Achuthanandan’ s last journey draws thousands
content: The cortege took more than 22 hours to cover a distance of around 150 km from Thiruvananthapuram to Paravur, as thousands lined the route to pay their last respects.   Despite heavy downpour, a large number of people turned out to say adieu to their beloved leader

title: 3 T.N. women arrested in Idukki for attempt to sell 139 rose-ringed parakeets

title: Browns unveil new 'Alpha Dawg' helmets, will don in three regular-season games
content: the helmet, called "Alpha Dawg," will be worn three times in the upcoming 2025 season . the helmet features an all-brown matte shell with a brown stripe between two orange stripes in the middle . it's the first timothy robertson helmet to be worn in the 2025 .

title: Numbers you need to know as you prep for draft day
content: numbers can tell us compelling stories, but they can mislead, usually when framed in a way to construct a narrative or support a specific claim . the numbers determine our teams' fates, and they have a massive say in our draft day, waiver wire and weekly lineup processes . as you prepare for the 2025 fantasy football season, .

title: Ranking best deadline rentals: CC Sabathia on Brewers? JD Martinez with D-backs?
content: the third baseman for the Arizona Diamondbacks is now challenging Cal Raleigh and Aaron Judge for the major league lead in home runs . if they do, Suarez could become one of the more impactful trade-deadline acquisitions we've seen . only five players have ever been traded in the middle of a 40-year period .

title: 2026 class rankings: Texas surges into the top 5
content: 11 five-star prospects have declared, including two recent commits . the longhorns are making themselves comfortable within SEC country . they landed running back Derrick Cooper, a one-time Georgia commit . Texas flipped ESPN 300 DT James Johnson from the Bulldogs, which helped spur the Horns' leap in the rankings .

title: Ekitike signs for Slot's new-look Liverpool team

title: Zubimendi joined Arsenal after rejecting Liverpool. Can he end their title wait?

title: Dynasty rankings: Top 300 players for 2025 and beyond

title: One month until college football: Swing games for every Top 25 team
